description: Blaake lost Mkaxs glasses. He wanted his money, and he wanted it now. The only problem was Blaake was a little low on cash. He did have plenty of ass on hand, though and wanted a shot at making things right with Mkax by doing some manual labor. He tried his best and worked a hard as he could to beg his friends forgiveness. he used his mouth and even offered to surrender the booty for the cause. By the end of this sweaty session, everyone forgot about the 300 dollar glasses and wanted more of the work for hire asses!
title: Tight Entry
